response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I propose to sell this exceptional item to you for $950,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between ensuring a fair return for my investment while presenting you with an attractive deal compared to its market value of $1,200,000. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit from this unique transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
